name: Event Calendar
backend_requirements: 1. Event model: id, title (required), date (required), time, description, location
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/events, POST, PUT, DELETE
frontend_requirements: 1. Event list grouped by date, showing title and time
2. Add event form with date picker, time picker, title, description
3. Click event to view details in modal
4. Edit and delete buttons per event
5. Filter buttons: Today, This Week, This Month, All
